thread.title: Here Are All the Oscar-Nominated Movies You Can Watch at Home Right Now
thread.title_full: Here Are All the Oscar-Nominated Movies You Can Watch at Home Right Now

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Here Are All the Oscar-Nominated Movies You Can Watch at Home Right Now
text:
The 89th Academy Awards are set to take place in Hollywood this weekend, and you can bet your bottom dollar that there will be a number of controversial decisions.
Thankfully, you don’t wait to see each movie in the cinema to realize what a gigantic mistake it was to award La La Land “Best Picture” award (it simply has to be Manchester By the Sea!) or what a shame it was that Tom Ford’s Nocturnal Animals got almost completely overlooked. That’s because 27 of the nominated movies are available to watch right now, from the comfort of your own sofa.
Check out the full list of Oscars 2017 nominees that are streaming right now below.
